items.name: ImageHandling
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: ImageHandling
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================

###*
* Enumeration describing the different types of image-handling.
*
* @module gs
* @class ImageHandling
* @extends gs.Component
* @memberof gs
* @static
###
class ImageHandling
    @initialize: ->
        ###*
        * Uses full image-size.
        * @property IMAGE_SIZE
        * @type number
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @IMAGE_SIZE = 0
        
        ###*
        * Uses only half image-height.
        * @property HALF_IMAGE_HEIGHT
        * @type number
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @HALF_IMAGE_HEIGHT = 1
        
        ###*
        * Uses a custom defined source-rectangle.
        * @property CUSTOM_SIZE
        * @type number
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @CUSTOM_SIZE = 2
    
ImageHandling.initialize()
gs.ImageHandling = ImageHandling
